posts.post_content:
Seems like it's been to long ago that the Trading Post was around :(

I know Doug and Luke used to start them.  I've made many a GREAT trade with these two "good guys" as well as numerous others ;) !!!!!

I find trading a fabulous way to not only add to your collection ..... but a great way to make new hobby friends.  Also, with trading, it ALWAYS seems everyone is happy :):):):)

So ................. if you have something you'd like to trade (other than selling it), post them here.


Also, I know I try to keep up on what people are looking for, but to many times drop the ball :o

Want it ????  NEED it !!!! Post it here !!!!!!

Just think :cool: --- Looking for + trade bait = :D:D:D:D

__________________________


I'll start:

I have a "few" :rolleyes: sales BSTs going.  Any remaining cards are open for trade.

Always looking for mid-tier backs:  From Polar Bear to Piedmont 460/42. 

[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]


Fun, Fun, Scott :rolleyes:

Looking for SGC graded A-2 SGC t206 HOFers. Got a few raw t206 hofers, and a some psa/bvg/raw t206 commons. Some non sport tobacco card sets, a few graded 50-70's stars. Lots of other random things to trade or could always do a cash/trade thing. Been a while since I did some trades and would love to get some done.Also collect pretty much any prewar hofers, t206 commons, and hofer autos.

Bruins

Do you have any t206 Cubs commons? I have a 1961 Billy Williams RC with autograph if you collect all HOFer autos.  The card is over in the 1960+ BST.  I would trade it for a couple of Cubs commons.
I'll see what I have

Looking to trade for or buy a Fred Clarke (Batting).

Can trade these, except for Pirates:
[url]https://www.collectorfocus.com/browse_collections/user_collection/1303/438/0[/url]

Looking for KC Players and Va SL.  I also collect Tinker, Evers and Chance Portraits with difficult Backs. Many Thanks Zach

Looking to acquire another rare back Cobb. I'm open to pose and brand, but preferably rare, and slabbed. For the right card, I'd trade other rare backs, some of which are HOFers.

I'm always on the lookout for bad condition T206 beaters. Got an ugly T206? I'll take it. I have some pre war baseball to trade and other goodies. Will buy individual cards or lots. No amount of creasing or paper loss too great!

Thanks in advance!

-Chris

posts.post_title: Wanted - Abbaticchio With Polar Bear Back
posts.post_content: Looking for a Poor-Fair-Good condition Abbaticchio with Polar Bear back for my Polar Bear subset.  Have extra T206 and T201 cards available for trade or willing to purchase outright.

The revival of this old thread reminds me how collecting wants/needs change .... check out my post #29.

15 months ago I probably needed Shag as one of my last (if not last) OMSL.  So I offer a Hindu Fritz (at which time I was not to interested in Hindus :o).

I don't remember if I traded straight up or sold then bought, but I did get my OMSL Shag. 

Now, over the past year, I have begun a SL Hindu adventure ... :eek:.... Oddly enough I now have a Hindu Shag ...:) ...  but still only have an OMSL Fritz ....:( .....

In other words, I'd like my Hindu Fritz back ...... :rolleyes:
